item.title: Quick Start
item.description: Getting Started 😎 1. Create a Gatsby site. If you are not using , following Gatsby Getting Started 2. Start developing. 3. Add your content…
item.content:encoded:
Getting Started 😎

1. Create a Gatsby site.

# create a new Gatsby site using the blog starter
$ npx gatsby new my-blog-starter https://github.com/JaeYeopHan/gatsby-starter-bee

If you are not using npx, following Gatsby Getting Started

$ npm install -g gatsby-cli
$ gatsby new my-blog-starter https://github.com/JaeYeopHan/gatsby-starter-bee

2. Start developing.

$ cd my-blog-starter/
$ npm start
# open localhost:8000

3. Add your content

You can write…

  • contents to blog in content/blog directory.
  • resume content/__about directory.

With markdown syntax and some meta data

Support script for creating new post

$ npm run post

4. Fix meta data

You can fix meta data of blog in /gatsby-meta-config.js file.

5. Publish with netlify

💡 if you want to deploy github pages, add following script to package.json

"scripts": {
    "deploy": "gatsby build && gh-pages -d public -b master -r 'git@github.com:${your github id}/${github page name}.github.io.git'"
}

:memo: Write a post!

content
├── __about
└── blog
  • You can register your resume on the web. (in __about directory)
  • You can register your post. (in blog directory)

🧐 Customize!

Gatsby config

/root
├── gatsby-browser.js // font, polyfill, onClientRender ...
├── gatsby-config.js // Gatsby config
├── gatsby-meta-config.js // Template meta config
└── gatsby-node.js // Gatsby Node config

Structure

src
├── components // Just component with styling
├── layout // home, post layout
├── pages // routing except post: /(home), /about
├── styles
│   ├── code.scss
│   ├── dark-theme.scss
│   ├── light-theme.scss
│   └── variables.scss
└── templates
    ├── blog-post.js
    └── home.js

Style

You can customize color in src/styles directory.

src/styles
├── code.scss
├── dark-theme.scss
├── light-theme.scss
└── variables.scss

Welcome to gatsby-starter-bee! Happy blogging! 👻

item.title: Welcome Bee starter
item.description: Welcome, Gatsby! This starter is full-package for your new blog! 1. Support Three frontmatter title date category 2. Code highlighting With…
item.content:encoded:
Welcome, Gatsby! This starter is full-package for your new blog!

1. Support Three frontmatter

---
title: 'Welcome Bee starter'
date: 2019-2-6 16:21:13
category: 'development'
---
  1. title
  2. date
  3. category

2. Code highlighting

  1. With Fira Code font
  2. Support highlighting with prism 2-1. Use inline highlighting
import React from 'react'

const TEMPLATE = 'gatsby-starter-bee'
class Foo extends React.Component {
  handleClick = val => {
    if (val === 'bar') {
      return 1
    } else if (val !== 'zoo') {
      return 2
    }
    console.log(`clicked`)
    return 3
  }

  render() {
    return <div>Welcome, Gatsby, ${TEMPLATE}</div>
  }
}

code

3. Support Markdown (h2)

  1. With Noto Sans font
  2. Support header anchoring

h3

h4

h5

quote!

bold italic

4. Support emoji 🚀

Based on emojione 🙏

5. Support light/dark mode

6. Support social sharing feature

  1. Twitter
  2. Facebook

Bonus, Buy me a coffee button

Set, buyMeACoffeeId of gatsby-meta-config.js

7. Comments feature

You can add comments feature by selecting one of them.

  • Disqus
  • utterances

8. Other features of this template

  1. You can add resume to /about
  2. Lazy rendering
  3. Scroll restoration
  4. Categorize posts
  5. Offline caching with service worker (based gatsby)
  6. Support GA(Google Analytics)

Let’s Start! Go

item.title: about
item.description: 👨‍💻 Hi, Hello this is Philographer. My name is 유호균 I’m working at Naver as SRE In this blog, I want to share my development experience…
item.content:encoded:
👨‍💻 Hi,

Hello this is Philographer. My name is 유호균

I’m working at Naver as SRE

In this blog, I want to share my development experience.

#SRE #TypeScript #Node.js #React #Productivity
GitHub http://github.com/philographer
E-mail yoohoogun114@naver.com

💼 Work Experiences

NAVER Corporation
period 18.7 ~ NOW
position Site Reliability Engineer
description - Develop search system reliability platform Monitor
- prototype search system topology visualization Moerae
projects Monitor, Moerae

Mondiran.ai
period 16.07 ~ 18.02
position SW Engineer Intern
description - Developed body fat analysis application Inbody Wear App
- Visualized population data Seoul De Facto Population
project Inbody Wear App, 서울시 생활인구 시각화

Incheon District Court
period 15.06 ~ 15.09
position Student Intern
description - Office assistant (education, legal)
- Electronicize legal docs using korea elec court system

📝 Blog

Tech blog: https://philographer.github.io

About SRE, Data Pipeline, JavaScript and Postmortem are mainly posted.

📊 Projects

Inbody社 Wear App

  • Improved legacy application for the yser experience
  • Designed and developed business logic for saving local database
  • Implemented front-end animation like InBody measurement
  • Increased correctness sleep calculation algorithm

Seoul De Facto Population

  • Visualized the time, age, and region data of Seoul population based on the population data
  • Optimized back-end Business logic for performance

APST.inc Homepage

  • Developed mailing service using mailgun api
  • Deployed service on AWS

Find My Rest Room App

  • Ddeveloped app can find the toilets around you and leave a review.
  • Used Angular 1.x, Ionic

🍭 Activities

📣 Presentation

[2018.04.18] AWS Summit 2018

https://www.slideshare.net/awskorea/college-student-user-group-special-session-developing-image-crawing-prototype-with-serverless

I shared my experience in developing image crawls using the AWS serverless

⛑ Communities

AWS Student UserGroup
period 17.06 ~ 18.08 Jun 2017 – Aug 2018
description AUSG is aws user group for university student. This community lectures on aws experience.
Homepage Here

Code For Incheon Organizer
period 15.07 ~ 16.12
description Code for Incheon is a voluntary project group of Incheon citizens for solving social problems through technology.
Homepage Here
Press 중앙일보: 깝고 깨끗한 화장실 어딨지? 전국 1만 개 위치 한눈에

📦 Lectures

Unithon 6TH Pre-Event

https://github.com/awskrug/unithon-serverless-2018

I taught serverless for university student at the event

AWS KRUG University Support Group 2018

https://www.slideshare.net/awskr/ausg-aws-2

I taught Elastic Beanstalk for aws begginer at the event

🏆 Prized

2017 Unithon 4th second prized

https://www.slideshare.net/yoohogyun/4-86916750 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dz8pTsjmpI0&t=1s

Unithon is a university student hackerthon. This hackerthon supported by AWS, MS Azure, Vingle, NH Bank and also.

2016 ArtCenter Nabi Civic hackerthon First Prize

http://news.mk.co.kr/newsRead.php?no=312089&year=2016

Civic hackerthon is a hackathon for solving urban problems. In particular, focused on solving the blackout problem.

🎓 Education

Inha University
period 12.02 ~ 19.02
Link http://eng.inha.ac.kr/mbshome/mbs/eng/index.do
major Computer Science Engineering (CSE)
status Bachelor’s degree
  • Learnd basic of computer science like network and data structure
  • Involved in .net club activities

SW Maestro
period 16.06 ~ 17.07
Link https://swm.recruiter.co.kr/appsite/company/index
status completion
  • Learned project management method using agile & scrum methodology
  • Pitching business idea to public or VC
  • Take a course for back-end & front-end

Thank you for reading my resume.

If you want to contact me, Please send me an email.


Site Reliability Engineer, @Philographer✌
